text: Maeve Binchy Snell (or just Maeve Binchy; 28 May 1939Born 1939 as per biography, Maeve Binchy by Piers Dudgeon, Thomas Dunne Books 2013; (hardcover), pp. 4, 280, 302; (ebook) â€“ 30 July 2012) was an Irish novelist, playwright and short story writer. Her novels sold more than 40 million copies worldwide. Binchy was born in Dublin, Ireland. She died there after a brief illness, aged 73. ==References== Category:Disease-related deaths in the Republic of Ireland Category:Writers from Dublin Category:1939 births Category:2012 deaths
title: Maeve Binchy
